       * @returns {{value:boolean,prevent:boolean,handler:(value?:boolean)=> void,callbacks:((value:T,oldValue:T)=> void)[]}} }
       */
      const useModal = (modalId, buttonId) => {
        const modal = { value: false, prevent: false, callbacks: [] };
        modal.handler = (value) => {
          if (modal.prevent) return;
          const oldValue = modal.value;
          modal.value = value ?? !modal.value;
          if (modal.value) {
            document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).addClass("!flex");
          } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).removeClass("!flex");
          }
          if (modal.value !== oldValue)
            modal.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(modal.value, oldValue));
        };
        if (buttonId)
          $(concat("#%s%", buttonId)).on("click", () => modal.handler());
        $(concat("#backdrop-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        $(concat("#close-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        return modal;
      };

       */
      const useState = (initialValue, name) => {
        const state = {
          value: initialValue,
          setValue: (value) => {
            const oldValue = state.value;
            state.value = value;
            if (name) {
              if (typeof value === "string") {
                if (value) localStorage.setItem(name, value);
                else localStorage.removeItem(name);
              } else
                console.error(
                  "Auto save localstorage only supported string value"
                );
            }
            if (value !== oldValue)
              state.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(value, oldValue));
          },
          callbacks: [],
        };
        return state;
      };

        if (!provider) return null;
        if (window.ethereum.providers) {

            switch (walletName) {
              case "metamask":
                return provider.isMetaMask;
              case "coinbase":
                return provider.isCoinbaseWallet;
            }
          });
        }
        switch (walletName) {
          case "metamask":
            if (provider.isMetaMask) return provider;
            break;
          case "coinbase":
            if (provider.isCoinbaseWallet) return provider;
            break;
        }

      function filterByName(data, text) {
        const dataClone = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(data));
        return Object.values(dataClone).filter((item) =>

      function filterByCategory(data, text) {
        const dataClone = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(data));
        return Object.values(dataClone).filter((item) => {
          if (text === "all") {
            return true;
          }
          return text.toLowerCase().includes(`${item.type}`.toLowerCase());
        });
      }

      const filterByCategoryRender = () => {
        let value = "";

        if ($("#filter-cartoon").is(":checked")) {
          value = value + "cartoon";
        }

        if ($("#filter-anime").is(":checked")) {
          value = value + "anime";
        }

        if ($("#filter-basketball").is(":checked")) {
          value = value + "basketball";
        }

        if ($("#filter-baseball").is(":checked")) {
          value = value + "bongchay";
        }

        if ($("#filter-all").is(":checked")) {
          value = "all";
        }

        $("div.nft-item").remove();
        $("div.not-found-text").remove();
        $("#nft-search-skeleton").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-search-list-container").addClass("hidden");

        if (value === "") {
          $("#nft-search-wrapper").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-search-list-container").addClass("hidden");
        } else {
          $("#nft-search-wrapper").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#filter-modal").addClass("hidden");
          setTimeout(() => {
            $("#nft-search-skeleton").addClass("hidden");
            $("#nft-search-list-container").removeClass("hidden");
          }, 1000);
        }

        const dataSearch = filterByCategory(fakeData, value);

        const nftTemplate = $("#nft-search-list .nft-item-template");

        if (dataSearch.length === 0) {
          $("#nft-search-list-container").append(
            `<div class="text-center text-white/80 w-full not-found-text">No results found</div>`
          );
        }

        // Render NFT item
        dataSearch.forEach((item, index) => {
          if (index < 8) {
            const itemElm = nftTemplate.clone();
            itemElm
              .removeClass("nft-item-template hidden")
              .addClass("nft-item");
            itemElm.attr("id", "nft-search-item-" + item.id);
            itemElm.on("click", function () {
              var id = $(this).attr("id");
              history.pushState(
                { id: index, tokenId: item.id },
                "",
                `/nftdetail.html`
              );
              localStorage.setItem("nftId", index);
              localStorage.setItem("tokenId", item.id);
              window.location.href = `/nftdetail.html`;
            });
            $("#nft-search-list").append(itemElm);
            const queryChild = concat("#nft-search-item-%s%", item.id);
            $(queryChild).attr("data-token-id", item.id);
            $(queryChild + " .nft-item-id").text("#" + Number(item.id));
            $(queryChild + " .nft-item-name").text(item.name);
            $(queryChild + " .nft-item-image").attr("src", item.image_url);
            $(queryChild + " .nft-item-price").text(
              Number(item.price) / 10 ** 18
            );
            $(queryChild + " .nft-description").text(item.short_description);
            $(queryChild + " .nft-pack").text("Pack: " + item.short_pack);
          }
        });
      };

      $("#filter-apply").on("click", filterByCategoryRender);

      $("#sort-button").on("click", function () {

      $("#filter-button").on("click", function () {

      function sortByOption(data, text) {
        const dataClone = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(data));
        return Object.values(dataClone).filter((item) => {
          if (text === "most-popular") {
            return item.mostPopular;
          }
          if (text === "most-rare") {
            return item.mostRare;
          }
          if (text === "top-offer") {
            return item.topOffer;
          }
          return item;
        });
      }

        $("#nft-search-list-container").addClass("hidden");

          $("#text-sort-by").text(

              : value === "most-rare"

              : value === "top-offer"

              : "Recently Listed"

          $("#sort-modal").addClass("hidden");
          setTimeout(() => {
            $("#nft-search-skeleton").addClass("hidden");

      trendingPagination.callbacks.push((value, oldValue) => {
        const paginationTemplate = $(

        const totalPage = Math.ceil(value.total / 8);
        for (let i = 0; i < totalPage; i++) {
          const itemElm = paginationTemplate.clone();
          itemElm
            .removeClass(
              "hidden trending-pagination-active trending-pagination-btn-template"
            )
            .addClass("trending-pagination-btn-test");
          itemElm.attr("id", "pagination-trending-" + (i + 1));
          itemElm.text(i + 1);
          itemElm.on("click", function () {
            $(".nft-item").remove();
            $(
              "#nft-trending-pagination .trending-pagination-btn-test"

            trendingPagination.setValue({ page: i + 1, total: value.total });

          const itemIsActive = $("#pagination-trending-" + (i + 1));
          if (!itemIsActive.length) {
            $("#nft-trending-pagination").append(itemElm);
          }
        }
      });

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const state = history.state;
  const nftId = localStorage.getItem("nftId");
});

window.addEventListener("popstate", function (event) {
  location.reload();
});

/** Home **/

function openLoginModal() {
  $("#home-modal-connect").removeClass("hidden");
  $("#mobile-menu-side").removeClass("show");
}

function closeLoginModal() {
  $("#home-modal-connect").addClass("hidden");
}

function openSubmitCardModal() {
  $("#home-submit-card-modal").removeClass("hidden");
  $("#mobile-menu-side").removeClass("show");
}

function closeSubmitCardModal() {
  $("#home-submit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openSubmitCardFormModal() {
  closeSubmitCardModal();
  $("#home-submit-card-form-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function closeSubmitCardFormModal() {
  $("#home-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", true);
  $("#home-submit-card-generate-loading").removeClass("hidden");

  setTimeout(() => {
    $("#home-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", false);
    $("#home-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
    $("#home-submit-card-generate-loading").addClass("hidden");
    openGenerateShippingLabelSuccessModal();
  }, 3000);
}

function closeSubmitCardFormModalClose() {
  $("#home-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openGenerateShippingLabelSuccessModal() {
  $("#home-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function closeGenerateShippingLabelSuccessModal() {
  $("#home-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openSubmitCardStoreModalHome() {
  closeSubmitCardModal();
  $("#home-submit-card-store-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function closeSubmitCardStoreModalHome() {
  $("#home-submit-card-store-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openKYCModal() {
  closeLoginModal();
  $("#home-KYC-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function closeKYCModal() {
  $("#home-KYC-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openKYCFailedModal() {
  closeKYCModal();
  $("#home-kyc-failed").removeClass("hidden");
}
function closeKYCFailedModal() {
  $("#home-kyc-failed").addClass("hidden");
}

function openPaymentCryptoModal() {
  closePaymentCreditCardModal();
  $("#home-payment-crypto-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}
function closePaymentCryptoModal() {
  $("#home-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openPaymentCreditCardModal() {
  closePaymentCryptoModal();
  document
    .getElementById("home-payment-credit-card-modal")
    .removeClass("hidden");
}
function closePaymentCreditCardModal() {
  $("#home-payment-credit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function closePaymentModal() {
  closePaymentCreditCardModal();
  closePaymentCryptoModal();
}

function closePaymentSuccessModal() {
  $("#home-payment-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openPaymentSuccessModal() {
  closePaymentModal();
  $("#home-payment-success-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

/** NFT Detail **/

function nft_detail_openLoginModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-modal-connect").removeClass("hidden");
  $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-side").removeClass("show");
}
function nft_detail_closeLoginModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-modal-connect").addClass("hidden");
}

function nft_detail_openSubmitCardModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-submit-card-modal").removeClass("hidden");
  $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-side").removeClass("show");
}
function nft_detail_closeSubmitCardModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-submit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function nft_detail_openSubmitCardFormModal() {
  nft_detail_closeSubmitCardModal();
  $("#nft-detail-submit-card-form-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}
function nft_detail_closeSubmitCardFormModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function nft_detail_closeSubmitCardFormModalSuccess() {
  $("#nft-detail-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", true);
  $("#nft-detail-submit-card-generate-loading").removeClass("hidden");

  setTimeout(() => {
    $("#nft-detail-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", false);
    $("#nft-detail-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
    $("#nft-detail-submit-card-generate-loading").addClass("hidden");
    $("#nft-detail-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").removeClass(
      "hidden"
    );
  }, 3000);
}

function closeGenSuccesModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function nft_detail_openKYCModal() {
  nft_detail_closeLoginModal();
  $("#nft-detail-KYC-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}
function nft_detail_closeKYCModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-KYC-modal").addClass("hidden");
}
function nft_detail_openKYCFailedModal() {
  nft_detail_closeKYCModal();
  $("#nft-detail-kyc-failed").removeClass("hidden");
}
function nft_detail_closeKYCFailedModal() {
  $("#nft-detail-kyc-failed").addClass("hidden");
}

// mobile menu
window.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  $("#mobile-menu-button").on("click", () => {
    $("#mobile-menu-side").addClass("show");
  });
  $("#mobile-menu-close").on("click", () => {
    $("#mobile-menu-side").removeClass("show");
  });
  //nft detail
  $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-button").on("click", () => {
    $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-side").addClass("show");
  });
  $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-close").on("click", () => {
    $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-side").removeClass("show");
  });
  //blindBox
  $("#blindbox-menu-button").on("click", () => {
    $("#blindbox-menu-side").addClass("show");
  });
  $("#blindBox-menu-close").on("click", () => {
    $("#blindbox-menu-side").removeClass("show");
  });
  //blindBox detail
  $("#blindbox-detail-menu-button").on("click", () => {
    $("#blindbox-detail-menu-side").addClass("show");
  });
  $("#blindbox-detail-menu-close").on("click", () => {
    $("#blindbox-detail-menu-side").removeClass("show");
  });
  //transaction history
  $("#transaction-history-menu-button").on("click", () => {
    $("#transaction-history-menu-side").addClass("show");
  });
  $("#transaction-history-menu-close").on("click", () => {
    $("#transaction-history-menu-side").removeClass("show");
  });

  $("#drawbox-now-btn").on("click", () => {
    $("#deliver-card").removeClass("hidden");
  });

  $("#blindbox-detail-claim").on("click", () => {
    $("#deliver-card").addClass("hidden");
  });

  $('input[name="claim-method"]').on("change", function () {
    if ($(this).is(":checked")) {
      if ($(this).val() === "physical-card") {
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-nft") {
        $("#claim-nft-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-token") {
        $("#claim-token-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }
    }
  });

  $("#close-nft-detail-payment-failed").on("click", () => {
    $("#modal-nft-detail-payment-failed").addClass("hidden");
  });

  $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").on("click", () => {
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-container").removeClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-container").addClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").removeClass("active-btn");
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").addClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").on("click", () => {
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-container").addClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-container").removeClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").addClass("active-btn");
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").removeClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#blindbox-detail-claim-go-to-collection").on("click", () => {
    window.location.href = "./transactionhistory.html";

      const REFERRER = "morpheuslabs.io";
      /**

       */

      const CHAIN_ID = 11155111;
      const networks = {
        ethereum: {
          chainId: "0x1",

          nativeCurrency: {
            name: "ETH",

            decimals: 18,
          },

        },
        sepolia: {

          },

        },
      };
      const networksChainIds = {
        1: "ethereum",
        11155111: "sepolia",

      if (!networks[networksChainIds[CHAIN_ID]])
        console.error("CHAIN_ID invalid!");
      const RPC_URL = networks[networksChainIds[CHAIN_ID]].rpcUrls[0];

      const headers = {

      const shortText = (text, start, end) =>
        text.slice(0, start) + "..." + text.slice(text.length - end);

      /**
       * @param {string} text
       * @param {(string|number)[]} values
       */
      const concat = (text, ...values) =>
        text
          .split("%s%")
          .map((item, index) => item + (values[index] || ""))
          .join("");

      /** @type {{
       * methods:{

       * } | null} */

      const saleContractInstance =
        windowObject.$appContract?.contract?.address &&
        new web3Instance.eth.Contract(
          JSON.parse(windowObject.$appContract?.contract.abi),
          windowObject.$appContract?.contract.address

      // /** @type {{methods:{checkWhitelist:()=>{call:(address:string)=>Promise<boolean>})}} | null} */

      /**
       * @param {string} modalId
       * @param {string|undefined} buttonId
       * @returns {{value:boolean,prevent:boolean,handler:(value?:boolean)=> void,callbacks:((value:T,oldValue:T)=> void)[]}} }
       */
      const useModal = (modalId, buttonId) => {
        const modal = { value: false, prevent: false, callbacks: [] };
        modal.handler = (value) => {
          if (modal.prevent) return;
          const oldValue = modal.value;
          modal.value = value ?? !modal.value;
          if (modal.value) {
            document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).addClass("!flex");
          } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).removeClass("!flex");
          }
          if (modal.value !== oldValue)
            modal.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(modal.value, oldValue));
        };
        if (buttonId)
          $(concat("#%s%", buttonId)).on("click", () => modal.handler());
        $(concat("#backdrop-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        $(concat("#close-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        return modal;
      };

      /**
       * @template T
       * @param {T} initialValue
       * @param {string} name: If name different undefined will auto save to localStorage
       * @returns {{value: T, setValue: (value:T)=> void, callbacks:((value:T,oldValue:T)=> void)[]}}
       */
      const useState = (initialValue, name) => {
        const state = {
          value: initialValue,
          setValue: (value) => {
            const oldValue = state.value;
            state.value = value;
            if (name) {
              if (typeof value === "string") {
                if (value) localStorage.setItem(name, value);
                else localStorage.removeItem(name);
              } else
                console.error(
                  "Auto save localstorage only supported string value"
                );
            }
            if (value !== oldValue)
              state.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(value, oldValue));
          },
          callbacks: [],
        };
        return state;
      };

      /** @param {"cardNumber"|"cardExpiry"|"cardCvc"} id*/
      const createStripeElement = (id) => {
        const stripeElement = elements.create(id, {
          style: {

              "::placeholder": {
                color: "#ffffffb3",
              },
            },
          },
        });
        stripeElement.mount(concat("#%s%", id));
        return stripeElement;
      };

      /** @type {ReturnType<typeof useState<any>>}*/
      const provider = useState(null);
      const walletAddress = useState("", "walletAddress");

      /** @type {ReturnType<typeof useState<Wallet>>}*/
      const wallet = useState(undefined, "wallet");

      /** @type {ReturnType<typeof useState<Wallet>>}*/
      const connecting = useState(undefined);

      const headerMenu = useState(false);

      const nftList = useState([]);
      const nftDetail = useState(null);
      const total = useState(undefined);
      const loading = useState(false);
      const paymentCryptoLoading = useState(false);
      const paymentCreatditCrardLoading = useState(false);
      const paymentHash = useState("");

      const pricUSD = useState(0);

      const cardNumElement = createStripeElement("cardNumber");
      const cardCVCElement = createStripeElement("cardExpiry");
      const cardExpElement = createStripeElement("cardCvc");

      /** @param {Wallet} walletName */
      const getProvider = async (walletName) => {
        if (walletName === "walletconnect") {
          return await window.modal.getWalletProvider();
        }
        let provider = window.ethereum;
        if (!provider) return null;
        if (window.ethereum.providers) {
          provider = window.ethereum.providers.find((provider) => {
            switch (walletName) {
              case "metamask":
                return provider.isMetaMask;
              case "coinbase":
                return provider.isCoinbaseWallet;
            }
          });
        }
        switch (walletName) {
          case "metamask":
            if (provider.isMetaMask) return provider;
            break;
          case "coinbase":
            if (provider.isCoinbaseWallet) return provider;
            break;
        }
      };

      const initWallet = async () => {
        wallet.setValue(localStorage.getItem("wallet"));
        walletAddress.setValue(localStorage.getItem("walletAddress"));
        if (wallet.value === "walletconnect") {
          if (window.modal) {
            window.modal.subscribeProvider(async function (changed) {
              walletAddress.setValue(changed.address);
              provider.setValue(await getProvider(wallet.value));
            });
          }
        } else if (wallet.value) {
          provider.setValue(await getProvider(wallet.value));
          if (provider.value) {
            walletAddress.setValue(provider.value.selectedAddress);
          }
        }
      };

      const modalConnect = useModal("home-modal-connect", "home-login");
      const modalPayment = useModal("payment");
      const modalInvalidNetwork = useModal("invalid-network");
      const modalWhitelistFailed = useModal("whitelist-failed");

      const modalPaymentSuccess = useModal("payment-success");

      const connectWeb3modal = async () => {
        if (!window.modal) {
          console.error("WS library is not available!");
          return;
        }
        try {
          window.modal.subscribeProvider(async function (changed) {
            walletAddress.setValue(changed.address);
            wallet.setValue(changed.address ? "walletconnect" : null);
          });
          window.modal.subscribeState((state) => {
            if (state.open === false) connecting.setValue(null);
          });
          await window.modal.open();
        } catch (error) {
          connecting.setValue(null);
          console.error("Error connecting to the wallet:", error);
        }
      };

      /** @param {Wallet} walletName */
      const handleConnect = async (walletName) => {
        connecting.setValue(walletName);
        try {
          if (walletName === "walletconnect") return await connectWeb3modal();
          else {
            provider.setValue(await getProvider(walletName));
            if (provider.value) {
              const addresses = await provider.value.request({
                method: "eth_requestAccounts",
              });
              wallet.setValue(walletName);
              walletAddress.setValue(addresses[0]);
            }
          }
        } catch (error) {
          console.log(error);
        }
        connecting.setValue(null);
      };

      const handleDisconnect = () => {
        if (provider.value.disconnect) {
          provider.value.disconnect();
        } else {
          provider.value.request({
            method: "wallet_revokePermissions",
            params: [{ eth_accounts: {} }],
          });
        }
        wallet.setValue(null);
        walletAddress.setValue("");
        headerMenu.setValue(false);
      };

      const handleValidateNetwork = async () => {
        if (!provider.value) throw new Error("No crypto wallet found");
        const chainId = await provider.value.request({
          method: "eth_chainId",
        });

        if (chainId === CHAIN_ID) return true;
        try {
          const result = await provider.value.request({
            method: "wallet_switchEthereumChain",
            params: [{ chainId: networks[networksChainIds[CHAIN_ID]].chainId }],
          });
          return true;
        } catch (error) {
          console.log(error);
          return false;

      const handleGetNFTDetail = async (tokenId) => {

          console.log(error);
          return null;
        } finally {
          loading.setValue(false);
        }

      function nft_detail_openPaymentSuccessModal() {

      async function addNFTToMetaMask(tokenAddress, tokenId, tokenImage) {
        try {
          const wasAdded = await ethereum.request({
            method: "wallet_watchAsset",
            params: {
              type: "ERC721", // Loại token là NFT (ERC-721)
              options: {
                address: tokenAddress, // Địa chỉ contract của NFT
                symbol: `NFT#${tokenId}`, // Tên hoặc ký hiệu của NFT
                decimals: 0, // Decimals luôn là 0 với NFT
                image: tokenImage, // URL hình ảnh NFT (phải là HTTPS hoặc IPFS gateway)
                tokenId: `${tokenId}`,
              },
            },
          });

          if (wasAdded) {
            console.log("NFT has been added to MetaMask!");
          } else {
            console.log("User rejected adding NFT to MetaMask.");
          }
        } catch (error) {
          console.error("Error adding NFT to MetaMask:", error);
        }

      const handleBuyNFTByCrypto = async () => {
        if (!walletAddress.value) {
          $("#nft-detail-modal-connect").removeClass("hidden");

          $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");

                dayjs()
                  .add(new Date().getTimezoneOffset(), "minute")
                  .add(8, "hour")
                  .format(`MMM-DD-YYYY hh:mm:ss A [SGT]`)
              );
              $("#nft-detail-payment-success-tx-hash").text(
                shortText(paymentHash.value, 16, 17)
              );
            })
            .on("transactionHash", function (hash) {
              paymentHash.setValue(hash);
            })
            .on("error", function (error) {
              console.log(error);
              if (
                error &&
                error.message.includes("User denied transaction signature.")
              ) {
                $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
                paymentCryptoLoading.setValue(false);
              } else {
                modalPaymentFailed.handler();
                $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
                paymentCryptoLoading.setValue(false);
              }
            })
            .catch(function (error) {
              if (
                error &&
                error.message.includes("User denied transaction signature.")
              ) {
                $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
                paymentCryptoLoading.setValue(false);
              } else {
                modalPaymentFailed.handler();
                $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
                paymentCryptoLoading.setValue(false);
              }
            });

          await addNFTToMetaMask(
            // contract address
            "0x899B12EEd2941DfcE6dfca7598312eC7B5961920",
            // token id
            history.state?.tokenId || localStorage.getItem("tokenId"),
            // image url
            nftDetail.value.image_url.replace(
              "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/",
              "https://beige-above-lamprey-995.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/"
            )
          );
        } catch (error) {
          console.log(error);
        }
      };

      const getNFTUSD = async () => {
        try {
          const res = await fetch(PRICE_USD_URL, { headers });
          /** @type {GetPriceUSDResponse} */
          const data = await res.json();

          pricUSD.setValue(data[0]?.data?.nft_price || 0);

          pricUSD.setValue(0);

      const getProofs = async () => {
        try {
          const res = await fetch(GET_PROOFS_URL, {

        } catch (error) {
          console.log(error);
          return null;
        }

      const handleBuyNFTByCreditCard = async () => {
        if (!walletAddress.value) {
          $("#nft-detail-modal-connect").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#mobile-nft-detail-menu-side").removeClass("show");
          $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
          return;
        }
        try {
          paymentCreatditCrardLoading.setValue(true);
          const paymentIntentOrder = await handleCreatePayment();

          if (!paymentIntentOrder) throw new Error("Cannot get payment intent");
          const { error, paymentIntent } = await stripe.confirmCardPayment(
            paymentIntentOrder.client_secret,
            { payment_method: { card: cardNumElement } }
          );
          paymentCreatditCrardLoading.setValue(false);
          if (error) throw new Error(error);

          nft_detail_openPaymentSuccessModal();
          $("#nft-detail-payment-success-time").text(
            dayjs()
              .add(new Date().getTimezoneOffset(), "minute")
              .add(8, "hour")
              .format(`MMM-DD-YYYY hh:mm:ss A [SGT]`)
          );
        } catch (error) {
          console.log(error);
          modalPaymentFailed.handler();
        }
      };

      walletAddress.callbacks.push((value) => {
        if (value) {
          $("#nft-detail-mobile-userAdress").text(shortText(value, 4, 4));
          $("#nft-detail-userAdress").text(shortText(value, 4, 4));
          $("#wallet-address-kyc").text(value);
          $("#login").hide();
          $("#wallet").show();
          $("#crypto-pay").show();
          $("#credit-card-pay").show();
          $("#payment-login").hide();
          $("#nft-detail-login").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-modal-connect").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-mobile-login").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-mobile-userAdress").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-userAdress").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-modal-connect").addClass("hidden");

          // getProofs();
        } else {
          $("#login").show();
          $("#wallet").hide();
          $("#crypto-pay").hide();
          $("#credit-card-pay").hide();
          $("#payment-login").show();
          $("#nft-detail-userAdress").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-login").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-mobile-userAdress").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-mobile-login").removeClass("hidden");
        }
      });
      connecting.callbacks.push((value, oldValue) => {
        if (value) {
          $(concat("#loading-%s%", value)).show();
          $(concat("#%s%", value)).addClass("active");
        }
        if (oldValue) {
          $(concat("#loading-%s%", oldValue)).hide();
          $(concat("#%s%", oldValue)).removeClass("active");
        }
      });
      headerMenu.callbacks.push((value) => {
        if (value) $("#header-menu").show();
        else $("#header-menu").hide();
      });

      loading.callbacks.push((value) => {
        if (value) {
          $("#nft-detail-card-container-loading").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-card-container").addClass("hidden");
        } else {
          $("#nft-detail-card-container-loading").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-card-container").removeClass("hidden");
        }
      });

      paymentCryptoLoading.callbacks.push((value) => {
        if (value) {
          $("#nft-detail-submit-card-crypto-connect").attr("disabled", "");
          $("#nft-detail-loading-connect-wallet").removeClass("hidden");
        } else {
          $("#nft-detail-loading-connect-wallet").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-submit-card-crypto-connect").removeAttr("disabled");
        }
      });

      paymentCreatditCrardLoading.callbacks.push((value) => {
        if (value) {
          $("#nft-detail-submit-card-pay").attr("disabled", "");
          $("#nft-detail-loading-creadit-card").removeClass("hidden");
        } else {
          $("#nft-detail-loading-creadit-card").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-submit-card-pay").removeAttr("disabled");
        }
      });

      nftDetail.callbacks.push((value, oldValue) => {
        $("#nft-detail .nft-detail-id").text("#" + value.token_id);
        $("#nft-detail .nft-detail-name").text(value.name);
        $("#nft-detail .nft-detail-owner-address").text(value.owner_name);
        $("#nft-detail .nft-detail-price").text(Number(value.price) / 10 ** 18);
        $("#nft-detail-token-id-bottom").text(value.token_id);
        $("#nft-detail-owner-bottom-address").text(
          getShortHash(value.owner_address, 6, 4)
        );
        $("#nft-detail-card-bg").attr(
          "src",
          value.image_url.replace(
            "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/",
            "https://beige-above-lamprey-995.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/"
          )
        );
        $("#nft-detail-contract-address").text(
          getShortHash(windowObject.$appContract.contract?.address, 6, 4)
        );
      });

      const getNFTs = async () => {
        loading.setValue(true);
        if (total.value === undefined) await getSize();
        if (total.value === 0) {
          nftList.setValue([]);
          loading.setValue(false);
          return;
        }

        const index = history.state?.id || localStorage.getItem("nftId");

        const nfts = await saleContractInstance.methods
          .getSaleList(index, 1) // TODO: change to page and limit
          .call();
        nftList.setValue(
          nfts.map((item) => ({
            price: item.price,
            tokenId: item.tokenId,
          }))
        );
        loading.setValue(false);
      };

      $("#nft-detail-metamask").on("click", () => handleConnect("metamask"));

      $("#nft-detail-walletconnect").on("click", () =>
        handleConnect("walletconnect")
      );
      $("#nft-detail-coinbase").on("click", () => handleConnect("coinbase"));
      $("#button-header-menu").on("click", () =>
        headerMenu.setValue(!headerMenu.value)
      );

      // handle disconnect
      $("#nft-detail-userAdress").on("click", handleDisconnect);
      $("#nft-detail-mobile-userAdress").on("click", handleDisconnect);

      // BUY NFT
      $("#nft-detail-submit-card-crypto-connect").on(
        "click",
        handleBuyNFTByCrypto
      );

      // open payment modal
      $("#nft-detail-buy").on("click", () => {
        $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal .nft-crypto-id").text(
          "#" + nftDetail.value.token_id
        );
        $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal .nft-crypto-name").text(
          nftDetail.value.name
        );
        $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-price").text(
          Number(nftDetail.value.price) / 10 ** 18 + " ETH"
        );
        $("#nft-detail-card-bg-crypto").attr(
          "src",
          nftDetail.value.image_url.replace(
            "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/",
            "https://beige-above-lamprey-995.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/"
          )
        );
      });

      // add nft to metamask
      $("#nft-detail-submit-card-done").on("click", () => {
        nft_detail_closePaymentSuccessModal();
      });

      $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-open").on("click", () => {
        $("#nft-detail-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-modal").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-modal .nft-credit-card-name").text(
          nftDetail.value.name
        );
        $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-modal .nft-credit-card-id").text(
          "#" + nftDetail.value.token_id
        );
        $("#nft-detail-payment-credit-card-price").text(
          Number(nftDetail.value.price) / 10 ** 18 + " ETH"
        );
        $("#nft-detail-card-bg-credit-card").attr(
          "src",
          nftDetail.value.image_url.replace(
            "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/",
            "https://beige-above-lamprey-995.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/"
          )
        );
      });

      // Buy by credit card
      $("#nft-detail-submit-card-pay").on("click", handleBuyNFTByCreditCard);

      $("#nft-detail-make-offer-close-x").on("click", () => {
        $("#nft-detail-make-offer-modal").addClass("hidden");
      });

      $("#nft-detail-make-offer-success-close").on("click", () => {
        $("#nft-make-offer-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
      });

      $("#nft-detail-make-offer-pay").on("click", () => {
        $("#nft-detail-loading-make-offer").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-detail-make-offer-pay").attr("disabled", "");
        setTimeout(() => {
          $("#nft-make-offer-success-modal").removeClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-make-offer-modal").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-loading-make-offer").addClass("hidden");
          $("#nft-detail-make-offer-pay").removeAttr("disabled");
        }, 5000);
      });

      //open modal make offer
      $("#nft-detail-make-offer").on("click", () => {
        $("#nft-detail-make-offer-modal").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#nft-detail-make-offer-modal .nft-make-offer-id").text(
          "#" + nftDetail.value.token_id
        );
        $("#nft-detail-make-offer-modal .nft-make-offer-name").text(
          nftDetail.value.name
        );
        $("#nft-detail-make-offer-price").text(
          Number(nftDetail.value.price) / 10 ** 18 + " ETH"
        );
        $("#nft-detail-card-bg-make-offer").attr(
          "src",
          nftDetail.value.image_url.replace(
            "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/",
            "https://beige-above-lamprey-995.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/"
          )
        );
      });

      const getShortHash = (address = "", firstpart, lastPart) => {
        if (address?.length <= 18) return address;
        return address
          ? `${address.slice(0, firstpart ? firstpart : 10)}...${address.slice(
              -(lastPart ? lastPart : 8)
            )}`
          : "";
      };
      initWallet();
      getNFTs();
      // getNFTPrice();
      getNFTUSD();
      handleGetNFTDetail(
        history.state.tokenId || localStorage.getItem("tokenId")
      );
    };
  </script>

  $("#trx-history-kyc-failed").removeClass("hidden");
}
function trx_history_closeKYCFailedModal() {
  $("#trx-history-kyc-failed").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openPaymentCryptoModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentCreditCardModal();
  $("#trx-history-payment-crypto-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}
function trx_history_closePaymentCryptoModal() {
  $("#trx-history-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openPaymentCreditCardModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentCryptoModal();
  document
    .getElementById("trx-history-payment-credit-card-modal")
    .removeClass("hidden");
}
function trx_history_closePaymentCreditCardModal() {
  $("#trx-history-payment-credit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_closePaymentModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentCreditCardModal();
  trx_history_closePaymentCryptoModal();
}

function trx_history_closePaymentSuccessModal() {
  $("#trx-history-payment-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openPaymentSuccessModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentModal();
  $("#trx-history-payment-success-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openSubmitCardStoreModal() {
  trx_history_closeSubmitCardModal();
  $("#trx-history-submit-card-store-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_closeSubmitCardStoreModal() {
  $("#trx-history-submit-card-store-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

  });
  //transaction history
  $("#transaction-history-menu-button").on("click", () => {
    $("#transaction-history-menu-side").addClass("show");
  });
  $("#transaction-history-menu-close").on("click", () => {
    $("#transaction-history-menu-side").removeClass("show");
  });

  $("#drawbox-now-btn").on("click", () => {

  });

  $("#blindbox-detail-claim").on("click", () => {
    $("#deliver-card").addClass("hidden");
  });

  $('input[name="claim-method"]').on("change", function () {
    if ($(this).is(":checked")) {
      if ($(this).val() === "physical-card") {
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-nft") {
        $("#claim-nft-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-token") {
        $("#claim-token-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }
    }
  });

  $("#close-nft-detail-payment-failed").on("click", () => {
    $("#modal-nft-detail-payment-failed").addClass("hidden");
  });

  $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").on("click", () => {
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-container").removeClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-container").addClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").removeClass("active-btn");
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").addClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").on("click", () => {
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-container").addClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-container").removeClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").addClass("active-btn");
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").removeClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#blindbox-detail-claim-go-to-collection").on("click", () => {
    window.location.href = "./transactionhistory.html";
  });

  //nft action more
  // Bật/tắt menu khi nhấn nút
  $("#nft-action-more-1").on("click", function (event) {
    event.stopPropagation(); // Ngăn chặn sự kiện lan lên document
    $(".nft-action-more-content").each(function () {
      const $modal = $(this);
      // Kiểm tra nếu modal đang hiển thị và không phải là target của sự kiện click
      if (
        !$modal.hasClass("hidden") &&
        !$modal.is(event.target) &&
        $modal.has(event.target).length === 0
      ) {
        $modal.addClass("hidden");
      }
    });
    $("#nft-action-more-1-content").toggleClass("hidden");

<style>html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  margin: 0;
  overflow: auto !important;
}

html,
body {
  font-family: Poppins, sans-serif;
  font-weight: 400;
}

span+span {
  padding-left: 0.23em;
}

.modal-container {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to right,
      #1c1c1c 0%,
      #4f4c3c 50%,
      #1c1c1c 100%);
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.max-w-1320 {
  max-width: 1320px;
}

.max-w-1530 {
  max-width: 1530px;
}

.max-w-1468 {
  max-width: 1468px;
}

.modal-content {
  font-size: 32px;
  border-radius: 14px;
  padding: 48px;
}

.wallet-list li {
  letter-spacing: 0.25px;
  background: #4c4c4c;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.wallet-list li.active,
.wallet-list li:hover {
  background-image: linear-gradient(95.5deg, #f9efac 15.09%, #b49065 96.77%);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px 0px #f3e8ac;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  color: #252525;
}

.product-image-box {
  background-image: linear-gradient(90.01deg, #d3ceff 28.36%, #ff6157 78.73%);
}

#modal-payment .product-image-box {
  width: 172px;
  height: 129px;
}

#modal-payment input,
#cardNumber,
#cardExpiry,
#cardCvc {
  border: 1.2px solid #3b3b46;
  height: 42px;
}

.gradient-button {
  background-image: linear-gradient(95.5deg, #ff6157 15.09%, #d13232 96.77%);
  box-shadow: #fb6664 0px 0px 20px 0px;
}

.gradient-button:disabled {
  filter: grayscale();
}

#modal-detail .modal-container {
  max-width: 886px;
}

.text-f7f7f7 {
  color: #f7f7f7;
}

.bg-1c1c1c {
  background-color: #1c1c1c;
}

.text-1c1c1c {
  color: #1c1c1c;
}

.border-ffffff26 {
  border-color: #ffffff26;
}

.text-d93b39 {
  color: #d93b39;
}

#modal-detail .product-image-box {
  width: 290px;
}

.letter-025px {
  letter-spacing: 0.25px;
}

.border-373742 {
  border-color: #373742;
}

.bg-215441 {
  background-color: #215441;
}

.bg-1bdc2e26 {
  background-color: #1bdc2e26;
}

.bg-313131 {
  background-color: #313131;
}

.rounded-10 {
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.rounded-32 {
  border-radius: 32px;
}

.text-28d763 {
  color: #28d763;
}

.text-1bdc2e {
  color: #1bdc2e;
}

#modal-detail .description p {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
}

#modal-payment-success .modal-container {
  max-width: 768px;
}

#modal-payment-success .product-image-box {
  width: 172px;

      const concat = (text, ...values) =>

       * @param {string|undefined} buttonId
       * @returns {{value:boolean,prevent:boolean,handler:(value?:boolean)=> void,callbacks:((value:T,oldValue:T)=> void)[]}} }
       */
      const useModal = (modalId, buttonId) => {
        const modal = { value: false, prevent: false, callbacks: [] };
        modal.handler = (value) => {
          if (modal.prevent) return;
          const oldValue = modal.value;
          modal.value = value ?? !modal.value;
          if (modal.value) {
            document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).addClass("!flex");
          } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).removeClass("!flex");
          }
          if (modal.value !== oldValue)
            modal.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(modal.value, oldValue));
        };
        if (buttonId)
          $(concat("#%s%", buttonId)).on("click", () => modal.handler());
        $(concat("#backdrop-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        $(concat("#close-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        return modal;
      };

       * @returns {{value: T, setValue: (value:T)=> void, callbacks:((value:T,oldValue:T)=> void)[]}}
       */
      const useState = (initialValue, name) => {
        const state = {
          value: initialValue,
          setValue: (value) => {
            const oldValue = state.value;
            state.value = value;
            if (name) {
              if (typeof value === "string") {
                if (value) localStorage.setItem(name, value);
                else localStorage.removeItem(name);
              } else
                console.error(
                  "Auto save localstorage only supported string value"
                );
            }
            if (value !== oldValue)
              state.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(value, oldValue));
          },
          callbacks: [],
        };
        return state;
      };

      /** @param {Wallet} walletName */
      const getProvider = async (walletName) => {
        if (walletName === "walletconnect") {
          return await window.modal.getWalletProvider();
        }
        let provider = window.ethereum;
        if (!provider) return null;
        if (window.ethereum.providers) {
          provider = window.ethereum.providers.find((provider) => {
            switch (walletName) {
              case "metamask":
                return provider.isMetaMask;
              case "coinbase":
                return provider.isCoinbaseWallet;
            }
          });
        }
        switch (walletName) {
          case "metamask":
            if (provider.isMetaMask) return provider;
            break;
          case "coinbase":
            if (provider.isCoinbaseWallet) return provider;
            break;
        }
      };

      const initWallet = async () => {
        wallet.setValue(localStorage.getItem("wallet"));
        walletAddress.setValue(localStorage.getItem("walletAddress"));
        if (wallet.value === "walletconnect") {
          if (window.modal) {
            window.modal.subscribeProvider(async function (changed) {
              walletAddress.setValue(changed.address);
              provider.setValue(await getProvider(wallet.value));
            });
          }
        } else if (wallet.value) {
          provider.setValue(await getProvider(wallet.value));
          if (provider.value) {
            walletAddress.setValue(provider.value.selectedAddress);
          }
        }
      };

      const connectWeb3modal = async () => {
        if (!window.modal) {
          console.error("WS library is not available!");
          return;
        }
        try {
          window.modal.subscribeProvider(async function (changed) {
            walletAddress.setValue(changed.address);
            wallet.setValue(changed.address ? "walletconnect" : null);
          });
          window.modal.subscribeState((state) => {
            if (state.open === false) connecting.setValue(null);
          });
          await window.modal.open();
        } catch (error) {
          connecting.setValue(null);
          console.error("Error connecting to the wallet:", error);
        }
      };

      /** @param {Wallet} walletName */
      const handleConnect = async (walletName) => {
        connecting.setValue(walletName);
        try {
          if (walletName === "walletconnect") return await connectWeb3modal();
          else {
            provider.setValue(await getProvider(walletName));
            if (provider.value) {
              const addresses = await provider.value.request({
                method: "eth_requestAccounts",
              });
              wallet.setValue(walletName);
              walletAddress.setValue(addresses[0]);
            }
          }
        } catch (error) {
          console.log(error);
        }
        connecting.setValue(null);
      };

      const handleDisconnect = () => {
        if (provider.value.disconnect) {
          provider.value.disconnect();
        } else {

          });
        }
        wallet.setValue(null);
        walletAddress.setValue("");
        headerMenu.setValue(false);

            params: [{ chainId: networks[networksChainIds[CHAIN_ID]].chainId }],

          return true;

          console.log(error);
          return false;

    if ($(this).is(":checked")) {
      if ($(this).val() === "physical-card") {
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-nft") {
        $("#claim-nft-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-token") {
        $("#claim-token-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }

  });

  //nft action more
  // Bật/tắt menu khi nhấn nút
  $("#nft-action-more-1").on("click", function (event) {
    event.stopPropagation(); // Ngăn chặn sự kiện lan lên document
    $(".nft-action-more-content").each(function () {
      const $modal = $(this);
      // Kiểm tra nếu modal đang hiển thị và không phải là target của sự kiện click
      if (

<script>document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const state = history.state;
  const nftId = localStorage.getItem("nftId");
});

window.addEventListener("popstate", function (event) {
  location.reload();
});

/** Home **/

function openLoginModal() {
  $("#home-modal-connect").removeClass("hidden");
  $("#mobile-menu-side").removeClass("show");
}

function closeLoginModal() {
  $("#home-modal-connect").addClass("hidden");
}

function openSubmitCardModal() {
  $("#home-submit-card-modal").removeClass("hidden");
  $("#mobile-menu-side").removeClass("show");
}

}

  closeSubmitCardModal();
  $("#home-submit-card-form-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function closeSubmitCardFormModal() {
  $("#home-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", true);
  $("#home-submit-card-generate-loading").removeClass("hidden");

  setTimeout(() => {
    $("#home-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", false);
    $("#home-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
    $("#home-submit-card-generate-loading").addClass("hidden");
    openGenerateShippingLabelSuccessModal();
  }, 3000);
}

function closeSubmitCardFormModalClose() {
  $("#home-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function openGenerateShippingLabelSuccessModal() {
  $("#home-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").removeClass("hidden");

function closeGenerateShippingLabelSuccessModal() {
  $("#home-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

  $("#home-kyc-failed").addClass("hidden");
}

  closePaymentCryptoModal();
}

  });

    if ($(this).is(":checked")) {
      if ($(this).val() === "physical-card") {
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-nft") {
        $("#claim-nft-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-token") {
        $("#claim-token-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }
    }
  });

    $("#modal-nft-detail-payment-failed").addClass("hidden");
  });

    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").addClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").on("click", () => {
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-container").addClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-container").removeClass("hidden");
    $("#draw-blind-credit-card-btn").addClass("active-btn");
    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").removeClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#blindbox-detail-claim-go-to-collection").on("click", () => {
    window.location.href = "./transactionhistory.html";
  });

  //nft action more
  // Bật/tắt menu khi nhấn nút
  $("#nft-action-more-1").on("click", function (event) {
    event.stopPropagation(); // Ngăn chặn sự kiện lan lên document
    $(".nft-action-more-content").each(function () {
      const $modal = $(this);
      // Kiểm tra nếu modal đang hiển thị và không phải là target của sự kiện click
      if (
        !$modal.hasClass("hidden") &&
        !$modal.is(event.target) &&
        $modal.has(event.target).length === 0
      ) {
        $modal.addClass("hidden");
      }
    });
    $("#nft-action-more-1-content").toggleClass("hidden");
  });

    $(".nft-action-more-content").each(function () {
      const $modal = $(this);
      // Kiểm tra nếu modal đang hiển thị và không phải là target của sự kiện click
      if (
        !$modal.hasClass("hidden") &&
        !$modal.is(event.target) &&
        $modal.has(event.target).length === 0
      ) {
        $modal.addClass("hidden");
      }
    });
    $("#nft-action-more-6-content").toggleClass("hidden");
  });

              fetch(o.url, r)
                .then((e) => e.json())
                .then((e) => {
                  const t = new CustomEvent("".concat(o.name), { detail: e });
                  window.dispatchEvent(t),
                    console.log("dispatched event listener for: ", [
                      o.name,
                      new Date(),
                    ]);
                })
                .catch((e) => {
                  console.log("error: ", e), (i.innerHTML = JSON.stringify(e));
                });
          }
        });
        const o = t.getElementsByClassName("btn-reset")[0];
        o &&
          o.addEventListener("click", function (e) {
            t.reset();
          });
      }).bind(el)(props[el.id]);
    }

       * @returns {{value:boolean,prevent:boolean,handler:(value?:boolean)=> void,callbacks:((value:T,oldValue:T)=> void)[]}} }
       */
      const useModal = (modalId, buttonId) => {
        const modal = { value: false, prevent: false, callbacks: [] };
        modal.handler = (value) => {
          if (modal.prevent) return;
          const oldValue = modal.value;
          modal.value = value ?? !modal.value;
          if (modal.value) {
            document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).addClass("!flex");
          } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).removeClass("!flex");
          }
          if (modal.value !== oldValue)
            modal.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(modal.value, oldValue));
        };
        if (buttonId)
          $(concat("#%s%", buttonId)).on("click", () => modal.handler());
        $(concat("#backdrop-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        $(concat("#close-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)
        );
        return modal;

       */
      const useState = (initialValue, name) => {
        const state = {
          value: initialValue,
          setValue: (value) => {
            const oldValue = state.value;
            state.value = value;
            if (name) {
              if (typeof value === "string") {
                if (value) localStorage.setItem(name, value);
                else localStorage.removeItem(name);
              } else
                console.error(
                  "Auto save localstorage only supported string value"
                );
            }
            if (value !== oldValue)
              state.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(value, oldValue));
          },
          callbacks: [],
        };
        return state;
      };

      const useModal = (modalId, buttonId) => {
        const modal = { value: false, prevent: false, callbacks: [] };
        modal.handler = (value) => {
          if (modal.prevent) return;
          const oldValue = modal.value;
          modal.value = value ?? !modal.value;
          if (modal.value) {
            document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).addClass("!flex");
          } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
            $(concat("#modal-%s%", modalId)).removeClass("!flex");
          }
          if (modal.value !== oldValue)
            modal.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(modal.value, oldValue));
        };
        if (buttonId)
          $(concat("#%s%", buttonId)).on("click", () => modal.handler());
        $(concat("#backdrop-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>
          modal.handler(false)

        $(concat("#close-%s%", modalId)).on("click", () =>

      const useState = (initialValue, name) => {

          setValue: (value) => {
            const oldValue = state.value;
            state.value = value;
            if (name) {
              if (typeof value === "string") {
                if (value) localStorage.setItem(name, value);
                else localStorage.removeItem(name);
              } else
                console.error(
                  "Auto save localstorage only supported string value"
                );
            }
            if (value !== oldValue)
              state.callbacks.map((cb) => cb(value, oldValue));
          },
          callbacks: [],
        };
        return state;

  $("#trx-history-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_closeSubmitCardFormModalSuccess() {
  $("#trx-history-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", true);
  $("#trx-history-submit-card-generate-loading").removeClass("hidden");

  setTimeout(() => {
    $("#trx-history-submit-card-generate").attr("disabled", false);
    $("#trx-history-submit-card-form-modal").addClass("hidden");
    $("#trx-history-submit-card-generate-loading").addClass("hidden");
    $("#trx-history-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").removeClass(
      "hidden"
    );
  }, 3000);
}

function closeGenSuccesModalTrxHistory() {
  $("#trx-history-generate-shipping-label-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openKYCModal() {
  trx_history_closeLoginModal();
  $("#trx-history-KYC-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_closeKYCModal() {
  $("#trx-history-KYC-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openKYCFailedModal() {
  trx_history_closeKYCModal();
  $("#trx-history-kyc-failed").removeClass("hidden");
}
function trx_history_closeKYCFailedModal() {
  $("#trx-history-kyc-failed").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openPaymentCryptoModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentCreditCardModal();
  $("#trx-history-payment-crypto-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}
function trx_history_closePaymentCryptoModal() {
  $("#trx-history-payment-crypto-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openPaymentCreditCardModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentCryptoModal();
  document
    .getElementById("trx-history-payment-credit-card-modal")
    .removeClass("hidden");
}
function trx_history_closePaymentCreditCardModal() {
  $("#trx-history-payment-credit-card-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_closePaymentModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentCreditCardModal();
  trx_history_closePaymentCryptoModal();
}

function trx_history_closePaymentSuccessModal() {
  $("#trx-history-payment-success-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openPaymentSuccessModal() {
  trx_history_closePaymentModal();
  $("#trx-history-payment-success-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_openSubmitCardStoreModal() {
  trx_history_closeSubmitCardModal();
  $("#trx-history-submit-card-store-modal").removeClass("hidden");
}

function trx_history_closeSubmitCardStoreModal() {
  $("#trx-history-submit-card-store-modal").addClass("hidden");
}

      if ($(this).val() === "physical-card") {

        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").removeClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-nft") {
        $("#claim-nft-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-token-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#claim-token-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");
      }

      if ($(this).val() === "claim-token") {
        $("#claim-token-container").addClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-physical-card-container").removeClass("radio-active");
        $("#claim-nft-info").addClass("hidden");
        $("#physical-card-info").addClass("hidden");

    $("#draw-blind-crypto-btn").removeClass("active-btn");
  });

  $("#blindbox-detail-claim-go-to-collection").on("click", () => {
    window.location.href = "./transactionhistory.html";
  });

  $("#nft-action-more-1").on("click", function (event) {
    event.stopPropagation(); // Ngăn chặn sự kiện lan lên document
    $(".nft-action-more-content").each(function () {
      const $modal = $(this);
      // Kiểm tra nếu modal đang hiển thị và không phải là target của sự kiện click
      if (
        !$modal.hasClass("hidden") &&
        !$modal.is(event.target) &&
        $modal.has(event.target).length === 0

        $modal.addClass("hidden");
      }

<style>html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  margin: 0;
  overflow: auto !important;
}

html,
body {
  font-family: Poppins, sans-serif;
  font-weight: 400;
}

span+span {
  padding-left: 0.23em;
}

.modal-container {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to right,
      #1c1c1c 0%,
      #4f4c3c 50%,
      #1c1c1c 100%);
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.max-w-1320 {
  max-width: 1320px;
}

.max-w-1530 {
  max-width: 1530px;
}

.max-w-1468 {
  max-width: 1468px;
}

.modal-content {
  font-size: 32px;
  border-radius: 14px;
  padding: 48px;
}

.wallet-list li {
  letter-spacing: 0.25px;
  background: #4c4c4c;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.wallet-list li.active,
.wallet-list li:hover {
  background-image: linear-gradient(95.5deg, #f9efac 15.09%, #b49065 96.77%);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px 0px #f3e8ac;
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  color: #252525;
}

.product-image-box {
  background-image: linear-gradient(90.01deg, #d3ceff 28.36%, #ff6157 78.73%);
}

#modal-payment .product-image-box {
  width: 172px;
  height: 129px;
}

#modal-payment input,
#cardNumber,
#cardExpiry,
#cardCvc {
  border: 1.2px solid #3b3b46;
  height: 42px;
}

.gradient-button {
  background-image: linear-gradient(95.5deg, #ff6157 15.09%, #d13232 96.77%);
  box-shadow: #fb6664 0px 0px 20px 0px;
}

.gradient-button:disabled {
  filter: grayscale();
}

#modal-detail .modal-container {
  max-width: 886px;
}

.text-f7f7f7 {
  color: #f7f7f7;
}

.bg-1c1c1c {
  background-color: #1c1c1c;
}

.text-1c1c1c {
  color: #1c1c1c;

.card-container {
  background: linear-gradient(90deg,
      rgba(28, 28, 28, 0.4),
      rgba(79, 76, 60, 0.4),
      rgba(28, 28, 28, 0.4));
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.card-container::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-image: url("https://ml-webstudio-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/solutions/ctp_NFT-detail-bg.png");
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-position: top;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  pointer-events: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: 1;
}

  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: 1;
}

input[type="checkbox"] {
  /* -webkit-appearance: none;
  appearance: none; */
  background-color: transparent;

  accent-color: #000000;
  /* Thay đổi màu nền thành xám nhạt */

  /* Thay đổi viền thành màu xám đậm */
  width: 20px;
